user.title: Select Language
user.description: Please select your preferred language. This will determine the Bergfex domain used.

type.title: Select Report Type
type.description: Please select the type of report you want to monitor.

country.title: Select Country
country.description: Please select the country the area is located in.

ski_area_list.title: Select Bergfex Area
ski_area_list.description: Please select the {report_type} you want to monitor in {country}. Alternatively, you can enter the URL path for an area not found in the list.

ski_area_list_alpine.title: Select Bergfex Ski Resort
ski_area_list_alpine.description: Please select the ski resort you want to monitor in {country} ([Link to overview]({url})). Alternatively, you can enter the URL path for a resort not found in the list.

ski_area_list_cross_country.title: Select Bergfex Cross Country Area
ski_area_list_cross_country.description: Please select the cross country ski area you want to monitor in {country} ([Link to overview]({url})). Alternatively, you can enter the URL path for an area not found in the list.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Bergfex. Please check your internet connection.
error.no_areas_found: Could not find any ski areas for the selected country. There might be no current snow reports available.
error.no_selection: Please select a ski area from the list or provide a manual path.

abort.already_configured: This ski area is already configured.
